## Loading the data

This project is so interesting and relevant to my life,not really!

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```

> Word count: `r wordcountaddin::word_count()`



```{r}
candidates <- as_tibble(candidates) 
candidates
```

```{r}

cc <- candidates %>%
  select("cand_id", "cand_name", "cand_state", "cand_party_affiliation")
cc


```



```{r}
contributions <- as_tibble(contributions) 
contributions
```
